GSD.product_version: versions from v5.19 to before v6.1.12
GSD.description:
of: Make OF framebuffer device names unique

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.1.12 by commit a7f0ec26cd67e7ad6e56753694fddb67a9730f27, it was introduced in version v5.19 by commit 52b1b46c39ae4321459a1a28dd4e596497b375b8. For more details please see the references link.
